players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one who was found dead last night. Let's stay vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this crucial phase of the game."
Bob: "I agree with Alice, let's be vigilant and keep a close eye on each other."
Bob: "I think we should all start sharing information about our night actions to help build trust and ensure the safety of our village. Let's be open and honest with each other."
Diana: "I think it's important that we all share our night actions to promote transparency and trust in the village. I will go first: I did not visit anyone last night."

You: "I believe that in light of the recent events, it's crucial for us to continue sharing our night actions openly. I assure you all that I did not visit or communicate with anyone last night other than during the daytime discussion."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
